newsitem.title: USA: MidAmerican plans 675 MW plant restart Sat.
newsitem.headline: MidAmerican plans 675 MW plant restart Sat.

text.p: MidAmerican Energy Co's 675 megawatt (MW) Council Bluffs coal-fired power unit 3 will likely resume production Saturday following a repair outage, a company spokesman said.
The unit, located in Council Bluffs, Iowa, was taken off line Tuesday evening to repair a boiler tube leak, spokesman John McCarroll said Wednesday.
MidAmerican is the operator and 79 percent owner of Council Bluffs 3.
The remaining two coal-fired units at the site, with capacities of 43 MW and 88 MW, are 100 percent owned by MidAmerican and were operating normally, the spokesman said.
